Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can illustrate a device that allows communication over a distance, showing two cups connected by a string.
The student can draw the string tight between the two cups, demonstrating how sound travels from one cup to the other.
The student can depict the devices (cups) being used by two students separated by a given distance.
The student can label or explain how sound travels through the string to communicate messages over distance.
The student can include an explanation of the importance of the string being tight for effective communication.
CANNOT: The student may inconsistently show how this technology draws on scientific concepts of sound transmission (may not fully explain the scientific principle).
The student might not entirely highlight how the device works with sound as a means of communication rather than light (could imply or omit light as another method).
